name: Chiku
description: Labrador Retrievers are friendly, outgoing, and high-spirited companions who have more than enough affection to go around for a family looking for a medium-to-large dog.

name: Sheru
description: German Shepherds are courageous, confident, and smart. They are extremely faithful and have a high learning ability.

name: Tommy
description: Golden Retrievers are friendly, intelligent, and devoted. They're eager to please and always ready to play, making them great family pets.

name: Jimmy
description: Bulldogs are known for their loose, saggy skin, distinctive pushed-in nose, and adorable wrinkles. They are calm, courageous, and loving companions.

name: Billu
description: Beagles are curious, friendly, and merry. They are also known for their keen sense of smell and tracking abilities.

name: Stella
description: Poodles are proud, active, and very smart. They come in three sizes: standard, miniature, and toy.

name: Bhaalu
description: Siberian Huskies are friendly, gentle, and alert. They are known for their thick double coats and striking blue or multicolored eyes.

name: Alii
description: Boxers are bright, energetic, and playful. They are loyal companions and excellent guardians.

name: Doge
description: Dachshunds are curious, lively, and affectionate. They are known for their long bodies and short legs.

name: Cheems
description: Shih Tzus are affectionate, outgoing, and trusting. They are small, sturdy dogs with a long flowing double coat.

name: Lambu
description: Great Danes are gentle giants, friendly, and dependable. They are known for their imposing size and elegant appearance.

name: Chipi
description: Pomeranians are lively, bold, and inquisitive. They are small dogs with a big personality, known for their fluffy double coat and fox-like face.
